Session A Supplies

Each group needs the following:

  • Power supply breadboard with Session A setup:
    • 4x NPN transistors
    • 5x 110k (Br,Br,B) resistors
    • 3x pushbuttons
    • 2x red LED
    • 1x common ground RGB LED

It looks like this:
